name: PERUVIAN BODY WAVE
description:
Peruvian Natural body wave. High luster, and very thick hair. Two bundles are enough for a full head. With proper care, this hair can last 6 months+. If you desire your hair to be a different hue, other than the natural color 1b, please email me arielle.26@me.com for specifications. 

2 bundles (16,20) go for $120. If you desire three bundles (12,16,20) the cost is $215.
